title: Fragments, late 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Three small fragments of grey-blue (maybe purple originally) cut and uncut velvet on silk ground. Small scale allover design of diamond-shaped spaces, each enclosing a conventionalized palmette.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, late 16th century.
late 16th century. Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet). Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-57-a/c.
